snippet: Baseball’s regular season reached its quarter pole on Friday.
abstract: Baseball’s regular season has reached its quarter pole, meaning that one-fourth of the 2,430-game schedule is complete; such a moment prompts assumptions about the rest of the season, projections based mostly on what has happened.
lead_paragraph: Baseball’s regular season reached its quarter pole on Friday.

headline.main: Too Soon to Assume Anything in Baseball
headline.print_headline: With Quarter of Season Over, It’s Too Soon to Assume Much
